title: FireDAOJackie_Z
author: FireDAOJackie_Z
content: According to the Whitepaper, FireDAO is a social DAO based on Soulbound accounts and DID system. DAO is well known to everyone and by definition, FireDAO intends to create a social DAO that uses Soulbound Tokens(Soulbound accounts more in-depth) and DID system to realize a fully-decentralized organization. Besides, fire is a very important symbol here. What does fire stand for in your culture ? Over here, fire symbolizes power and hope. Please let me know your thoughts. Thanks.

comments.author: Dorothy V
comments.body: QuoteAll the fire-worshiping peoples in the world hold the same concept of fire: that is, to mystify and anthropomorphize the material properties of fire. They believe that fire can not only bring light and heat to human beings, but more importantly, fire is the god of light, happiness, cleanliness, and love, and has the power to dispel darkness and all ghosts and evils.The world is full of praise for fire. I don't know about this project, almost nothing. But the name is still good. The DID identity protocol of web3 is considered by many people as the asset confirmation of data on the chain. I am also optimistic about the NFT sector.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: FireDAOJackie_Z on March 10, 2023, 02:42:41 AMAccording to the Whitepaper, FireDAO is a social DAO based on Soulbound accounts and DID system. ..And where did you read the Whitepaper if it is not publicly available and is also missing from the site? Instead of telling us about the project in your own words, you would leave a link so that we could read about it ourselves and conclude what FireDAO is.

Instead of telling us about the project in your own words, you would leave a link so that we could read about it ourselves and conclude what FireDAO is.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5441307.0Â  Please refer to this thread and there are plenty of detailed info. Thanks for your time.

comments.author: RainbowKun
comments.body: Quote from: tvplus006 on March 10, 2023, 03:38:19 PMQuote from: FireDAOJackie_Z on March 10, 2023, 02:42:41 AMAccording to the Whitepaper, FireDAO is a social DAO based on Soulbound accounts and DID system. ..And where did you read the Whitepaper if it is not publicly available and is also missing from the site? Instead of telling us about the project in your own words, you would leave a link so that we could read about it ourselves and conclude what FireDAO is.Our white paper has not been finalized yet, so it has not been published on our official website.Currently, we are serializing our white paper in the ANN section with detailed content.However, we will soon improve our official website and upload the white paper. At that time, everyone can see our economic model and top-level design through our complete white paper.Please be patient and look forward to your valuable suggestions!
